name: Service Industrial Professional and Technical Union
goal: The Services, Industrial, Professional and Technical Union (SIPTU) represents over 180,000 workers from virtually every category of employment across almost every sector of the Irish economy. SIPTU provides the expertise, experience and back-up services necessary to assist workers in their dealings with employers, government and industrial relations institutions.
interests: Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives: Member of European Advisory Commitment on Safety and Health.
